io.openems.edge.bridge.modbus.api

Class ElementToChannelConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.openems.edge.bridge.modbus.api.ElementToChannelConverter
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ElementToChannelConverterChain, ElementToChannelOffsetConverter, ElementToChannelScaleFactorConverter

    public class ElementToChannelConverter
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides Functions to convert from Element to Channel and back. Also has some static convenience functions to facilitate conversion.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static ElementToChannelConverter DIRECT_1_TO_1
      Converts directly 1-to-1 between Element and Channel
      static ElementToChannelConverter INVERT
      Inverts the value from Element to Channel
      static ElementToChannelConverter KEEP_NEGATIVE_AND_INVERT
      Converts only negative values from Element to Channel and inverts them (makes the value positive)
      static ElementToChannelConverter KEEP_POSITIVE
      Converts only positive values from Element to Channel
      static ElementToChannelConverter SCALE_FACTOR_1
      Applies a scale factor of 1.
      static ElementToChannelConverter SCALE_FACTOR_1_AND_KEEP_NEGATIVE_AND_INVERT
      Applies SCALE_FACTOR_1 and CONVERT_NEGATIVE_AND_INVERT
      static ElementToChannelConverter SCALE_FACTOR_1_AND_KEEP_POSITIVE
      Applies SCALE_FACTOR_1 and CONVERT_POSITIVE
      static ElementToChannelConverter SCALE_FACTOR_2
      Applies a scale factor of 2.
      static ElementToChannelConverter SCALE_FACTOR_2_AND_INVERT
      Applies SCALE_FACTOR_2 and INVERT
      static ElementToChannelConverter SCALE_FACTOR_2_AND_KEEP_NEGATIVE
      Applies SCALE_FACTOR_2_AND_KEEP_NEGATIVE and @see INVERT
      static ElementToChannelConverter SCALE_FACTOR_2_AND_KEEP_NEGATIVE_AND_INVERT
      Applies SCALE_FACTOR_2 and @see KEEP_NEGATIVE_AND_INVERT
      static ElementToChannelConverter SCALE_FACTOR_2_AND_KEEP_POSITIVE
      Applies SCALE_FACTOR_2 and CONVERT_POSITIVE
      static ElementToChannelConverter SCALE_FACTOR_3
      Applies a scale factor of 3.
      static ElementToChannelConverter SCALE_FACTOR_MINUS_1
      Applies a scale factor of -1.
      static ElementToChannelConverter SCALE_FACTOR_MINUS_2
      Applies a scale factor of -2.

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ElementToChannelConverter(java.util.function.Function<java.lang.Object,java.lang.Object> elementToChannel)
      This constructs a forward-only converter from Element to Channel.
      ElementToChannelConverter(java.util.function.Function<java.lang.Object,java.lang.Object> elementToChannel, java.util.function.Function<java.lang.Object,java.lang.Object> channelToElement)
      This constructs and back-and-forth converter from Element to Channel and back

        • false: keep value (1-to-1)

      • elementToChannel

        public java.lang.Object elementToChannel(java.lang.Object value)
        Convert an Element value to a Channel value. If the value can or should not be converted, this method returns null.
        Parameters:
        value -
        Returns:
        the converted value or null
